app.name: InnerFriend
app.description: Piranti sing ngutamakake privasi kanggo njaga persahabatan sing migunani adhedhasar riset nomer Dunbar

landing.heroDescription: Miturut riset Dunbar, kita mung bisa njaga kurang luwih 5 persahabatan intim, 15 kanca cedhak, lan 150 hubungan sing migunani. Inner Friend mbantu sampeyan kanthi sengaja ngopeni hubungan sing paling penting.

intentionalLimits.title: Wates Sing Disengaja
intentionalLimits.description: Ilmu nuduhake yen kita duwe wates alami kanggo hubungan sing migunani. Tampa supaya fokus marang wong sing bener-bener penting.

privateByDefault.title: Pribadi Kanthi Default
privateByDefault.description: Dhaftar sampeyan tetep ana ing piranti sampeyan. Gawe akun mung yen sampeyan pengin persistensi lan pencocokan mutual opsional.

mutualDiscovery.title: Penemuan Mutual
mutualDiscovery.description: Opsional sinau nalika wong sing sampeyan dhaptar minangka cedhak uga wis ndhaptar sampeyan â€” rayaan alus saka timbal balik.

mission.title: Wektu Adu Rai, Dudu Iklan
mission.description: Kita menang nalika sampeyan ninggalake situs kita â€” kanggo nuduhake momen nyata karo wong sing paling penting. Nalika jarak misahake sampeyan, kita bakal mbantu miwiti panggilan video. Nanging ora ana sing ngluwihi ana ing kono.
mission.inspiration: Inspirasi kita: Dentyne Ice "Gawe Wektu Adu Rai"

landing.quote: "Ora kabeh hubungan simetris â€” lan iku pancen wajar. Tujuane dudu keseimbangan sing sampurna, nanging kehadiran sing disengaja."

validation.invalidEmail: Mangga lebokake alamat email sing valid
validation.mustAgreeToTerms: You must agree to the Privacy Policy and Terms of Service to create an account

toast.signUpSuccess: Akun digawe! Kowe saiki wis mlebu.
toast.emailAlreadyRegistered: Email iki wis didaftarake. Nyoba mlebu wae.
toast.invalidCredentials: Email utawa sandi salah. Mangga coba maneh.
toast.unexpectedError: Ana kesalahan sing ora dikarepake. Mangga coba maneh.

consent.dataProcessingNote: We process your data to provide the service. You can export or delete your data at any time.

tiers.nayborDescription: Tangga sing dipercaya kanggo tulung-tinulung lan darurat
tiers.parasocialDescription: Tokoh publik lan kreator konten sing diikuti
tiers.rolemodelDescription: Wong sing cerita uripe menehi inspirasi kanggo dadi apik, luwih apik, paling apik

feed.emptyCore: Tambah kanca inti kanggo ndeleng posting-e kene
feed.emptyInner: Tambah kanca cedhak kanggo ndeleng posting-e kene
feed.emptyOuter: Tambah kanca njaba kanggo ndeleng posting-e kene

feed.outerTab: Feed Njaba Plus - Lingkaran amba kalebu tangga

naybor.sosDialogButton: Bukak dialog kontak darurat Tangga SOS
naybor.chooseNaybors: Terusake kanggo milih tangga sing arep dihubungi
naybor.messageAll: Kirim pesen menyang {{count}} tangga sing dipilih
naybor.messageAll_plural: Kirim pesen menyang {{count}} tangga sing dipilih
naybor.locationDescription: Yen diaktifake, lokasi kira-kira bakal dibagekake karo tangga

language.communityTranslation: Gabung karo komunitas penerjemah kanggo nggawe InnerFriend bisa diakses wong akeh ing saindenging jagad.

errors.generic: Ana sing salah. Mangga coba maneh.

footer.tagline: Open source. Digawe kanthi ati-ati kanggo hubungan sing bermakna.

contactImport.title: Impor Kontak
contactImport.description: Impor kontak saka telpon, file vCard, utawa spreadsheet CSV. Kabeh kontak bakal ditambahake minangka kenal.
contactImport.capacityFull: Tingkat kenal wis kebak. Promosekake sawetara kontak kanggo nggawe papan.
contactImport.privacyNote: Data kontakmu tetep ana ing perangkatmu. Kita ora tau ngunggah utawa nyimpen.
contactImport.defaultCountryHint: Nomer telpon tanpa kode negara bakal nggunakake negara iki. Umume kontak disimpen tanpa kode negara.

promotionInfo.title: Dalan Promosi Gampang
promotionInfo.description: Kabeh kontak sing diimpor diwiwiti minangka kenal. Sampeyan bisa kanthi gampang promosekake kontak apa wae menyang:

fromPhone.title: Impor saka Telpon
fromPhone.description: Pilih kontak saka buku alamat telponmu

fromVCard.hint: Nampa file .vcf utawa .vcard saka iCloud, Google, Outlook
fromVCard.exportInstructions: Ekspor kontak saka email utawa app telpon minangka file .vcf, banjur impor ing kene.

fromCsv.mapColumnsDescription: Pilih kolom sing ngemot informasi kontakmu:

columnMapping.name: Kolom Jeneng Lengkap
columnMapping.orSeparate: Utawa gunakake kolom jeneng ngarep/mburi sing kapisah:

preview.title: Pratinjau Impor
preview.capacityWarning: Mung {{available}} saka {{total}} kontak sing bisa diimpor. {{skipped}} bakal dilewati amarga watesan kapasitas.
preview.duplicatesInfo: {{count}} kontak wis ana ing daftar kancamu lan bakal dilewati.
preview.promotionReminderDescription: Sampeyan bisa kanthi gampang promosekake kontak apa wae menyang Inti, Cedhak, Njaba, Tangga, utawa Panutan kapan wae.
preview.noContactsToImport: Ora ana kontak sing bakal diimpor

success.title: Impor Rampung!
success.promotionTip: Bukak tab Kelola kanggo promosekake kontak menyang Inti, Cedhak, Njaba, utawa tingkat liyane.

error.title: Impor Gagal
error.generic: Ora bisa ngimpor kontak. Mangga coba maneh.

errors.notSupported: Contact Picker ora didhukung ing perangkat iki
errors.invalidVCardFile: Mangga pilih file vCard sing valid (.vcf utawa .vcard)
errors.invalidCsvFile: Mangga pilih file CSV sing valid
errors.noContactsFound: Ora ana kontak sing ditemokake ing file
errors.nameColumnRequired: Kolom jeneng dibutuhake kanggo ngimpor kontak

contactImport.mobileOnly: Contact Picker mung kasedhiya ing perangkat mobile. Gunakake impor vCard utawa CSV.
contactImport.browserNotSupported: Browser sampeyan ora ndhukung Contact Picker. Gunakake impor vCard utawa CSV.
contactImport.useFileImport: Coba impor saka file vCard utawa CSV.

noPostsDescription.core: Your core friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.inner: Your inner circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!
noPostsDescription.outer: Your outer circle friends haven't shared anything yet. Be the first to share something!

getStarted.core: Get started by adding up to 5 friends to your Core.
getStarted.inner: Get started by adding up to 15 friends to your Inner Circle.
getStarted.outer: Get started by adding up to 150 friends to your Outer Circle.

addToSee.core: Add up to 5 friends to see their posts here.
addToSee.inner: Add up to 15 friends to see their posts here.
addToSee.outer: Add up to 150 friends to see their posts here.

emptyState.addParasocialsHint: Add creators, celebrities, or figures you follow
emptyState.acquaintedHint: Friends are reclassified here through lack of contact over time
emptyState.roleModelsHint: Add people whose life stories inspire you to be good, better, best
emptyState.nayborsHint: Introduce yourself to your naybors and add them here
emptyState.addToCircleHint: Add someone to your closest circle

connections.requestsDescription: Wong sing pengin nyambung karo sampeyan

roleModel.addDescription: Tambah wong sing crita uripe ngilhami sampeyan â€” urip utawa wis seda.
roleModel.whyRoleModel: Kenapa wong iki dadi role model?
roleModel.reasonPlaceholder: Jelasake apa sing sampeyan kagumi, sifat apa sing pengin sampeyan rangkul, utawa kepiye crita kasebut ngilhami sampeyan dadi apik, luwih apik, paling apik...
roleModel.visibilityNote: Iki bakal katon kanggo sambungan sing dikonfirmasi.
roleModel.editReasonDescription: Nganyari kenapa {{name}} dadi role model kanggo sampeyan.

reserved.deleteConfirmDescription: Iki bakal mbusak {{count}} papan direserfasi{{note}} saka tingkat {{tier}} sampeyan.
reserved.editDescription: Nganyari jumlah papan lan cathetan kanggo grup direserfasi iki.
reserved.notePlaceholder: Mung sampeyan sing bisa ndeleng iki. Cth, 'Wong saka grup hiking'
reserved.notePlaceholderLong: Mung sampeyan sing bisa ndeleng iki. Cth, 'Wong saka grup hiking' utawa 'Anggota kulawarga sing luwih seneng privasi'
reserved.addDescription: Reserfasi papan kanggo wong sing ora pengin sampeyan daftar kanthi jelas. Saben grup diitung menyang watesan {{tier}} sampeyan nanging tetep pribadi.

addFriend.circleFullHint: Kanggo nambah wong ing kene, sampeyan kudu mindhah kanca {{tier}} saiki menyang tingkat liyane dhisik.
addFriend.emailHint: Yen dheweke uga ndhaptar sampeyan minangka kanca {{tier}} lan sampeyan loro wis ngaktifake kabar, sampeyan loro bakal diwenehi kabar babagan sambungan bebarengan.
addFriend.phoneHint: Gunakake iki kanggo fitur Tending kanggo hubungi kanca.
addFriend.nayborPhoneHint: Nduwe info kontak kanggo tangga sampeyan penting kanggo darurat lan dhukungan bebarengan.

dashboard.title: Your Inner Circles
dashboard.subtitle: Curate and tend to your closest relationships
dashboard.localStorageHint: ðŸ’¡ Your lists are saved locally. Create an account to sync across devices and enable mutual matching.
dashboard.dunbarDisclaimer: Note: These Dunbar-inspired tier limits are subject to change as community conscience science evolves. Future modifications may include rules where certain tier counts affect others â€” for example, parasocial connections might reduce your allowable outer friend capacity.

toasts.dataLiberation: Your data belongs to you. Export anytime to take it elsewhere.

mission.title: Face Time, Not Ad Time
mission.description: We win when you leave our site â€” to share real moments with the people who matter most.
mission.inspiration: Our inspiration? This classic Dentyne Ice commercial â€” the perfect reminder that the best moments happen when you put down the phone and show up:
mission.quote: "Make Face Time" â€” that's the ideal. When distance separates you, we'll help you bridge it with video kalls. But always remember: nothing beats being there.

spark.title: Spark Video Kalls
spark.description: When you're apart, one click connects you

tend.title: Tend Your Circles
tend.description: Reminders to reach out before connections fade

pull.title: Pull Closer
pull.description: Move meaningful connections into tighter orbits

tending.title: Tend Your Circles
tending.markDescription: Mark your {{tier}} friends you haven't connected with {{period}}
tending.noFriendsInTier: No friends in this tier yet
tending.checkInstruction: âœ“ Check those you haven't talked to enough:
tending.mobileHint: Contact actions work best on mobile devices

reconnect.title: Time to Reconnect
reconnect.description: These friends could use some of your time

toasts.allTended: Amazing! You've tended to all your circles ðŸŒ±
toasts.rememberReachOut: Remember to reach out soon! ðŸ’›

keysShared.title: Kunci Sing Diwenehake

address.title: Alamatmu
address.description: Konfirmasi alamat omahmu kanggo petugas darurat

keyholders.title: Sing Nyekel Kunci
keyholders.description: Pilih tangga teparo sing duwe kunci utawa kode omahmu

permissions.title: Ijin Mlebu
permissions.description: Pilih kapan tangga teparo bisa mlebu omahmu nalika darurat

keysShared.addressHelp: This address will be shared with emergency responders when your naybors request help on your behalf.
keysShared.instructionsPlaceholder: Keypad is to the right of door, ring twice...
keysShared.instructionsHint: Include any details responders should know about accessing your home
keysShared.notesPlaceholder: Key is under the blue flowerpot...
keysShared.selectNaybors: Add a naybor who has access:
keysShared.noNaybors: Add naybors first to share keys with them
keysShared.allNayborsAssigned: All your naybors have been assigned
keysShared.mandatoryScenariosHelp: These life-threatening or safety-critical scenarios always allow entry. They cannot be disabled because they protect life, limb, and innocent humans from trauma.
keysShared.optionalScenariosHelp: You can choose whether naybors can enter for these scenarios.

cardiac_arrest.name: Cardiac Arrest
cardiac_arrest.description: Heart attack or sudden cardiac arrest â€” every second counts

choking.name: Choking
choking.description: Choking emergency â€” airway blocked, needs immediate help

drowning.name: Drowning
drowning.description: Drowning in pool, bathtub, or other water

anaphylaxis.name: Anaphylactic Shock
anaphylaxis.description: Severe allergic reaction from bee sting, food, medication

elderly_fall.name: Elderly Fall
elderly_fall.description: Elderly person fallen, unable to get up, possibly injured

fire.name: Fire
fire.description: Fire detected â€” threat to life, limb, tissue, anyone immobilized or asleep

gas_leak.name: Gas Leak
gas_leak.description: Gas leak detected â€” explosion/poisoning risk

carbon_monoxide.name: Carbon Monoxide
carbon_monoxide.description: CO detector alarm â€” silent killer, occupants may be unconscious

childhood_corporal.name: Childhood Corporal Punishment
childhood_corporal.description: Child alerting naybors to corporal punishment. Research shows community intervention prevents future violence.

take10_spiral.name: Take 10 Shouting Spiral
take10_spiral.description: Domestic shouting escalating unacceptably. De-escalation intervention needed.

bedroom_consent.name: Bedroom Consent Conflict
bedroom_consent.description: Detected bedroom consent conflict emergency â€” immediate intervention required

medical_other.name: Other Medical Emergency
medical_other.description: Other medical emergency requiring home entry

intruder_check.name: Intruder Check
intruder_check.description: Check on suspected intruder when you cannot respond

welfare_check.name: Welfare Check
welfare_check.description: General welfare check when you are unresponsive for extended period

flooding.name: Flooding/Water Leak
flooding.description: Water leak or flooding â€” property damage prevention (not life-threatening)

keysShared.reviewWarning: By saving these settings, you authorize your designated naybors to enter your home during the selected emergency scenarios. Make sure you trust these people with access to your home.

emergencyWorkerSharing.title: Akses Petugas Darurat
emergencyWorkerSharing.enabledDescription: Dispatch darurat sing diverifikasi (ambulans, pemadam, polisi) bisa njaluk Door Key Tree sampeyan nalika nanggapi kedaruratan ing alamatmu.
emergencyWorkerSharing.disabledDescription: Layanan dispatch darurat ORA bakal duwe akses menyang kontak kunci tetangga sampeyan. Mung tetangga sing ditunjuk sing bisa nggunakake informasi iki.
emergencyWorkerSharing.warning: Mateni iki bisa ngundurake respon darurat yen responden kudu nyerang lawang tinimbang nggunakake kunci sing dicekel tetangga.
emergencyWorkerSharing.reviewEnabled: Dispatch darurat bisa ngakses Door Key Tree sampeyan

doorBreaking.title: Preferensi Nyerang Lawang
doorBreaking.description: Yen responden darurat ora bisa nggayuh pemegang kunci, kepiye carane kudu maju?

break_fast_no_naybors.name: Nyerang Cepet, Lewati Tetangga
break_fast_no_naybors.description: Ing kedaruratan, nyerang lawang langsung. Ora mbuwang wektu kanggo hubungi tetangga kanggo kunci.

break_fast_call_naybors.name: Nyerang Cepet, Telpon Tetangga
break_fast_call_naybors.description: Hubungi tetangga kanggo kunci, nanging ora ragu nyerang lawang yen perlu. Kecepatan minangka prioritas.

last_resort_only.name: Mung Pilihan Terakhir
last_resort_only.description: Tulung mung nyerang lawang sawise pertimbangan sing ati-ati, minangka pilihan terakhir nalika sacara hukum perlu.

settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
settings.deleteAccountWarning: This action cannot be undone. All your friends, posts, settings, and other data will be permanently deleted.
settings.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.

naybor.underMinWarning: Sampeyan mung duwe {{count}} tangga â€” kita nyaranake paling ora 3
naybor.underMinDescription: Duwe tangga sing dipercaya cedhak iku penting kanggo darurat, bantuan bebarengan, lan mbangun ketahanan komunitas. Kenalake dhewe marang tanggamu!
naybor.mrRogersQuote: "Apa sampeyan ora dadi tanggaku?" â€” Fred Rogers
